stolen_amulet.name: The Stolen Amulet
stolen_amulet.description: Marta's precious amulet was stolen by bandits in the Dark Forest. She asks you to retrieve it from their camp.
objectives: Find the bandit camp in the Dark Forest
Defeat the bandit leader or steal the amulet
stolen_amulet.lore: This amulet represents Marta's past as an adventurer. It's one of the few mementos she has left from her fallen comrades. The bandits don't know its true sentimental value.

forest_herbs.name: Gathering Moonleaf
forest_herbs.description: The forest guardian Elara asks you to collect rare Moonleaf herbs from the forest depths.
objectives: Collect 5 Moonleaf herbs from the Dark Forest
forest_herbs.lore: Moonleaf is sacred to the forest elves and has powerful alchemical properties.
